task.shortdesc: System administrators and messaging administrators can configure queues by using the Message Queues page in the .

context.p: You can configure queues by using the , or by using . For more information about using to configure queues, see .
For more information about the components you specify when you configure a queue, see .

step.cmd: Go to the Message Queues page:

choices.choice: From the Messaging menu, click Message Queues.

step.cmd: Choose an action from the Queues pane:

choices.choice: To add a queue, click the Add icon.
To delete a queue, select the queue and click the Delete icon.
To edit a queue, select the queue and click the Edit icon.
